info.name: LMS API - Complete Collection
info.description: Complete API collection for Learning Management System with all endpoints

request.description: Register a new student account. Gender is optional (MALE or FEMALE).
Example: Register a female student with gender field.
Example: Register a student without gender (gender is optional).

item.name: Get Current User
item.description: Get current authenticated user profile including gender field.

item.name: Get Home Data
item.description: Get home page data including banners, popular courses, and courses by categories.

item.name: Get Courses by Category
item.description: Get courses by category ID with pagination and filters.

item.name: Get Featured Courses
item.description: Get featured/popular courses (isFeatured: true) with pagination.

item.name: Get Basic Courses
item.description: Get basic courses (isBasic: true) with pagination. Can be filtered by category.

item.name: Get Basic Courses by Year
item.description: Get basic courses filtered by targetYear. Returns courses where isBasic: true and targetYear matches the provided year.

item.name: Get Featured Courses by Year
item.description: Get featured courses filtered by targetYear. Returns courses where isFeatured: true and targetYear matches the provided year.

item.name: Get Featured Courses by All Years
item.description: Get all featured courses grouped by targetYear. Returns courses grouped by year with a list of available years.

variable.description: Course ID to get exams for

request.description: Get all exams for a specific course. Returns exam list with types and question counts.
Submit exam answers. Supports multiple question types (MCQ, TRUE_FALSE, ESSAY). Returns detailed results with correct answers and scoring.

item.name: Get Profile
item.description: Get user profile including gender field. Returns profile completion status for students.

request.description: Update user profile. Only allowed fields can be updated. Sensitive fields (id, email, role, status) are protected and cannot be updated.
Example: Update profile with FEMALE gender.
Change user password. Requires current password for security.
